author: petergrossmann
title: Cardano features for everyone
description: Often things like minting, burning, tracking tokens or registering tokens in the token-registry is not accessible for non-technical users

author: mikolaj.glinka
title: Frictionless document verification
description: Phishing & forgery result in data, money & time loss. Frictionless tools are needed to restore transactional trust and protect all actors.

author: torben
title: Trustful Global Projects
description: Developers and clients want to work successfully together, but making agreements or payments internationally is complicated.

author: wvalthar

description: It's common to need to show users what is in their wallet, nfts, tokens, etc. Most projects don't integrate it since its difficult to build.

title: @chain-lib Token mint/sell any site
description: Minting and selling NFTs should be a seamless process that everyone can be part of.

title: @chain-lib bundle selling component
description: It should be easy to sell tokens and bundles of tokens on your website without being a technical expert.

author: wvalthar

description: It should be easy for users to put up an item or bundle of items for users to bid on, on their website, without a ton of technical know-how.

author: wvalthar
title: @chain-lib WordPress Plugin
description: It should be easy for anyone to create a Cardano web3 compatible website, regardless of their technical expertise.

title: DAO-NET: Voting DApp

title: PRToken

title: Rythmeet:a versatile music platform

Centralized App in the long terme won't rise to the challenge of Contributionism.
OST must use dApps to spread the message further on.

Counterfeit markets vigorously steal money from brands and consumers.
Brands need a platform to maximize NFT's potential as digital assets.

title: Web based transaction editor
